text: "I'll Be Home for Christmas" is a holiday song written via Buck Ram, Walter Kent and Kim Gannon. It was first sung by Bing Crosby beginning in 1943. It's been covered by many other artists, such as The Carpenters, Johnny Mathis, Amy Grant and Jordin Sparks throughout the years. ==References== Category:Christmas songs Category:1940s songs Category:Bing Crosby songs Category:Kelly Clarkson songs Category:Amy Grant songs Category:Johnny Mathis songs Category:The Carpenters songs Category:Camila Cabello songs Category:The Killers songs Category:Elvis Presley songs Category:Carrie Underwood songs Category:Jordin Sparks songs Category:Kenny Chesney songs Category:Sara Evans songs Category:Barbra Streisand songs Category:1943 works
title: I'll Be Home for Christmas
